Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: samiam77
Reviews.Content: Perfect for what we were looking for. It was a neat clean place to lay our heads for the night. This was a no frills place to stay but really nice. It was newly remodeled and had a great location. The price was right and we wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “horrible.. save yourself time & money!”
Reviews.Author: kelly7693
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I made reservations for the Buckingham months ago. When we arrived at the motel and entered our room, we were in SHOCK!! The room was absolutely filthy and looked like it hadn't been cleaned in weeks. There was sand everywhere in the bathroom, towels were damp and moldy smelling, hair was everywhere.. After all of this i flipped back the bed only to find stained sheets and HOLES that had been CHEWED in the bed from bugs. I was absolutely disgusted and couldn't bare the thought of even standing in that room, let alone sleeping in it. When we let the front desk know what was wrong, they were less than accomodating and refused to return our money. We were furious and we walked down Baltimore Avenue looking for different rooms until we were able to find a beautiful one at the Spinnaker Motel where we stayed for our trip. I will NEVER return here again, and I will make sure none of my family/friends make the same mistake!!

Reviews.Title: “A Great Apartment!!!”
Reviews.Author: VictoriaResh
Reviews.Content: Stayed there last week in one of the apartments. 2 bedrooms, kitchen, nice bathroom. Grandma had her own room while daughter & 2 grandsons shared the other. Place was awesome. Parking a little hairy but 2 of the 4 days we were able to park right out front in the off-street driveway. Help was very friendly when we asked for towels & trash bags. We'll definitely book this again next year.

Reviews.Title: “We will be back”
Reviews.Author: 5Poole
Reviews.Content: I was surprised by this little gem.We decided a week before our trip that we were going to stay over night instead of just going for a day trip. So I went searching for a hotel that would be close to the boardwalk since we have 5yr old daughter. The price was GREAT, almost to great for a hotel about a block off the boardwalk. For the low price we were expecting a run down place,but since we only need a place to sleep and shower we took a chance. I am glad we did!!! The hotel is sweet. A cute place. Yes the rooms are small,but like I said you really only need a room for showering and sleeping. The rooms were clean, the staff was very nice and helpful. The front porch is great for sitting and people watching. WIFI in the rooms is a plus. I also found that they have apartments and efficiency apartments at a great daily price. The only down side is there is no phone in the room at all. Yes we all have cell phones now but.. the only way you can get a hold of the front desk is to either call them on your cell phone or walk down to the lobby. Also the pillows are very flat. That being said, My family will be back to the Buckingham next year.

Reviews.Title: “Last minute plans...”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer A
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I headed to the beach on a last minute fun day before back to school. The hotel was very nice, newly painted rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable. I was disappointed in the BATHROOM... really outdated and the tub/shower was NASTY. The faucet and shower head were hanging by a thread, lot's of calk holding it on and zero water pressure. And I was surprised not to find a hairdryer :( Parking was not so fun, but we found a spot. I might go back in a pinch... but It won't be my first choice.

Reviews.Title: “Great for a short trip!”
Reviews.Author: KimmyNJ
Reviews.Content: We just spent last Friday-Sunday in OCMD and chose the Buckingham due to it's location and cost. We arrived shortly after 3pm and our room was ready...It was a King bed non-smoking. Room was small but very clean....looked like new paint, new carpet, new bed, new furniture, new light fixtures, new windows. There was also a microwave and decent size mini-fridge. Bathroom was the only outdated part of our room....it was very old looking (dirty wallpaper, a few ants, loose door knob on a very old door). We had no real issues with this hotel...check in/out was very quick. Maid service cleaned decently, however, did not replace towels. A few cons to this hotel: parking (lot was super small, although this situation is not at all unique to this hotel...once we parked we never moved the car because we were afraid we wouln't get a spot again), no hairdryer, no iron, no room phone, no blankets, flat pillows. That being said I don't have any real complaints and found the hotel decent for a short trip for the two of us. If their prices stay as competitively low as they are now ,we will most definitely return in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: Brittany E
Reviews.Content: The service is horrible. They told us that the room would be okay for early check in so we came at 12:00pm and was told the room will not be ready until 3:00 pm . When showing up at 3:00pm we were then told the room will not be ready until 5:00pm! The hotel is nice but accommodations for mistakes and taking responsibility for them will not be found at this hotel! The only option you have is a full refund! The manager was not helpful what so ever!!!! When making your customer wait for a room they paid for and are not getting you think they would then offer you a late check out? This did not happen! Understood things run behind but that is not your customers fault and that is not the customers responsibility to pay for it. The manager did not even help but the one desk clerk Sean was very helpful.... Maybe a change in management would help

Reviews.Title: “first trip to ocean city”
Reviews.Author: Crystal W
Reviews.Content: I thought the hotel was very clean. We stayed at the building with the suites and there is supposed to be outside table and chairs for all rooms and we were the only room that didn't have one. The staff was really nice and helpful. I would consider staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Overall, very nice for a good price.”
Reviews.Author: AM481003
Reviews.Content: Stayed July 6 to 9th, 2012. The rooms may be too small for some people but were fine for our group(5 girls). Hotel room was very clean. Like that the toilet/shower is separate from the sink/counter so other people can get ready while someone is showering. Includes dishes and pots. Only complaint is they only have one parking permit per room, and I don't think they even have space on the lot for 1 car per room. Finding street parking can be difficult sometimes. Super close walk to the beach/boardwalk. Beds were comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “After 4th of July Mini vacation.”
Reviews.Author: fvanwhy
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 nights at the Buckingham. The hotel seems to be recently renovated with paint and probably new beds. The staff was very polite and helpful. My wife even had her hair braided by one of the girls. There were only a few minor issues. Our pillows were really flat! And as with most places in Ocean City the parking was very tight. We also only received maid service one of the four days. We did get new towels everyday though. Overall we were satisfied with the hotel. It was somewhat old school, with the small sized rooms, but nice.

Reviews.Title: “Renovated but still dirty.”
Reviews.Author: ChefSarah67
Reviews.Content: This hotel has been completely renovated. We stayed there 6 nights. The first 3 days our bathroom was not cleaned at all, I had to go out in the hall and ask a maid to please clean our bathroom. She did, however then the rest of our room was not cleaned, beds not made. I had to ask at the desk to please have the room cleaned. The hallways were also dirty. The room was tiny. There was no table or chairs to sit down and use the wifi. The staff at the desk were very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “An Affordable and Nice Place to Stay in OC”
Reviews.Author: Greenknight2613
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have been staying at the Buckingham since we were in high school so we decided to return this summer after hearing about the renovations that were performed on the property. As was the case with the Buckingham in our high school and college years, the Buckingham is still a diamond in the rough. The staff at the hotel is incredibly friendly, the rooms are incredibly clean and comfortable, and the location is second to none. With the recent renovations everything looked fresh and new. Our room was on the second floor and we had no problems accessing the free and fast WiFi network. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: Susan E
Reviews.Content: We were there Memorial Day weekend and enjoyed our stay here. Room was small but comfortable. Staff was awesome. Location was great. Maybe because it was a holiday weekend, our minimum stay had to be 3nights..which was not our initial plan. Overall, I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Wow this place is GREAT”
Reviews.Author: charles w
Reviews.Content: They totally remodeled the entire place. The pictures are definately an attest to this. I just left from cruisers weekend and we will definately be back for the 4th of july. Friendsly staff, clean rooms, GREAT location. this is our new go to spot.

Reviews.Title: “Good if you don't watch tv or use the internet”
Reviews.Author: kladams99
Reviews.Content: The room is comfortable. What I mean is you open the door to walk in...there's the bed not even a foot away. Clean sheets and comforter. No closet, but you are compensated with a foldable wall hanger, a dresser, and two night stands. In the bathroom, the shower and everything was clean. New towels and wash rags. I give the personal controlled a/c a plus. There's a small microwave and mini fridge. The flat screen tv comes with a remote. Turning on the tv looks like you have cable...no you have 25 random channels...never thought I'd miss NBC. No tv guide or list of channels. I connected to the wifi on my first day in the hotel, but the signal has been gone since. When I asked the woman at the front desk, she said she wasn't sure.

Reviews.Title: “Not so hot....”
Reviews.Author: CassiK
Reviews.Content: 1) This hotel boasts of wifi, but it is so very slow that it is virtually impossible to load any web pages. I was attempting to keep up with my studies while in Ocean City, but had to click on a web page and then find something to do while the page loaded. 2) There are NO phones in the room. If you want to communicate with someone else staying at the hotel, you have to climb up or down the narrow stairs and then attempt to find their room in the convoluded set-up. 3) The place is old and musty, the rooms are SERIOUSLY small. There is no place to hang your clothing, put your suitcase, etc. The rooms were VERY VERY tiny. The bathroom is in much need of repair and update and the desk clerk spoke broken English at best. She then got irritated when we asked for clarification.

Reviews.Title: “Way Below Standard”
Reviews.Author: MarkW1971
Reviews.Content: After much searching the internet and many phone calls we thought we found a nice economical place to spend our family vacation at the beach. Yay. Until arrival. DO NOT go by the pictures on the internet. Very misleading. We pulled into the parking area ( we had two vehicles because there were six in our party) that was very small and cramped but hey, we'll make due. We went inside the office around 2pm to check in. They said the room wasnt ready yet and that check in wasnt until 4pm anyway but they would give us a parking permit so we could leave our car there until our room was ready. They would only give us a permit for one vehicle and said that we would have to find street parking somewhere else for the second vehicle. We decided that since we were only a block from the boardwalk that we would go grab an early dinner before we checked in to get that out of the way. At dinner we decided that by the looks of the outside of the hotel that it would be best if we looked at the 2 bedroom apartment before we checked in to see what it actually looked like. This is where the real disappointment begins. Upon entering the apartment it looked as if it were some sort of a frat house with stains on the floors and walls, a kitchen table that looked like it belonged along side the street with a "free" sign on it, the place smelled bad, and the bathroom tile looked as if someone tried to paint the grout black because it was stained that bad with missing tile. We decided to go back to the front desk and ask for a refund and take our chances trying to find somewhere else to stay due to the overall condition of the apartment. We were told that it is not in their policy to refund the deposit regardless of what we thought of the place. (In dispute with my credit card company right now). This is a huge vacation area and we came to the decision that if we couldnt find another place to stay that we would hop back in the vehicles and make the four and a half hour return trip home. IT REALLY IS THAT BAD. After walking up and down the area for a couple hours and a dozen or so inquiries to other hotels/motels that could possibly accomodate our 6 person party we finally found another 2 bedroom apartment at The Commander Hote. 100% upgrade. The price was about $200 more for the five night stay but it was well worth it. Very clean, Very well maintained and a very understanding and professional staff. I do highly recommend The Commander Hotel. Now, if I was an 18 year old recently graduated from high school at the beach for senior week with intentions of drinking my way in to oblivion while at the beach the Buckingham would be fine as I wouldnt have to worry about breaking or ruining anything in my drunken stupor. I dont see how anyone stays at the Buckingham hotel. At least not in the apartment building.

Reviews.Title: “Not again.”
Reviews.Author: cody h
Reviews.Content: This is the third time I've stayed at the Buckingham, and it will be our last. Started with wrong info on their website, but due to it being the cheapest still, and so close to the boardwalk, I sucked it up for my family and booked the room. Tub was broke, either water was burning hot or freezing cold, basically had to break in to my own room every time I unlocked the door because the door wouldn't open, and had to continually ask for more towels. It is cheap and close to the beach/boardwalk, and yes, you get what you pay for, but next year I'll pay the extra money.

Reviews.Title: “Just what we needed”
Reviews.Author: Carlile D
Reviews.Content: I have been coming to ocean city for years and this was my first time at the buckingham. The buckingham was perfect because it was close to the beach but also not right on the boardwalk so we didnt get all the noise from people passing by. Tons of great resturaunts right in walking distance. I was very impressed with the new remodeled rooms. They obviously put a lot of work in last winter to get this place in shape. According to the manager, the hotel will go through phase 2 in the renovations this upcoming winter. Asside from the location and the rooms I found that the staff was absolutely the best i have ever seen. They are extremely friendly and really easy to get to know. They love to talk about things to do and offered some terrific advice. We brought an extra car and since tthey only allow one on their parking lot the clerk actually got in the car with me and helped me find free street parking. Whoever chose this staff should get some serious credit. I would recomend this hotel to anyone that is looking to have an affordable stay in ocean city.

Reviews.Title: “We all go a little mad sometimes.”
Reviews.Author: farrell9025
Reviews.Content: Reading past reviews, I was terrified of this place and fuming when my friend informed me that he'd booked us a room for a quick weekend getaway at the last minute. My only salvation came from the couple recent reviews that appear to have been published post-renovation. All in all, my experience wasn't terrible. This isn't exactly the hotel you recommend to others or want to spend more than 2 days in, though. Rolling up to this place, I was convinced a young Anthony Perkins (or worse, a young Vince Vaughn) would come traipsing out of the door to help me with my bags. The fact that our bathroom had a small door with a missing knob on it that connected to the adjacent motel room didn't help ease my fears that I'd be hearing stuccato violins during my last seconds on this earth. Thankfully, that's about all that's off-putting about this place. Apparently the renovations they did recently were sufficient because during a 2 night, 3 day stay I didn't see one insect or discarded condom (inside...the parking lot had a stray Lifestyles wrapper blowing about in the wind. Though better safe than sorry) that other, pre-renovation reviews mentioned. Linens were clean and the bathroom was spotless, if only a bit old. The whole place needed new wallpaper altogether. And I couldn't imagine staying in that small of a room for more than 2 nights without killing whoever I was with. The two staff I encountered weren't terrible or rude. Just strange. The cleaning lady was spunky and sassy but never delivered on the clean linens she promised us. I had to bring our wet towels to the girl at the front desk who appeared younger than I am (23), who told me I "cccoooooould have new towels, but they're all in the dryer". Thankfully, after returning from dinner later that night, a pile of fresh towels were waiting for us when we opened our door. The parking lot was cramped, and the other guests there seemed to be young kids who were about 2 months too late celebrating Senior Week, or people who just didn't know any better/had no other choice...95% of the hotels this past weekend were rocking the NO VACANCY sign, including Buckingham. Basically, this is a place to rest your (hopefully drunken) head for a night or two when you have no other choice (or money). Don't even dare book a room for a week and bring the kids for a nice family get-away. It's steps from the boardwalk, and it's cheap, but you get what you pay for. Thankfully, the price no longer includes bugs. Or a hillside view of "Mother's house"...

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Keri C
Reviews.Content: The Buckingham Hotel was a great place to stay. The rooms were clean, and the staff was very caring. I heard horror stories about other Hotels that were so much more expensive while vacationing in Ocean City. I would recommend the hotel to anyone that wants to have a good time. We spent a lot of our spare time talking to other hotel residents on the porch of the Buckingham. The porch and talking to others was a lot of fun. Have a great time in Ocean City, Keri Costello

Reviews.Title: “I could eat off the toilet seat”
Reviews.Author: aberner1
Reviews.Content: Really...i could eat off the toilet seats at this place. It's easy to maintain a clean hotel in my mind, but what isn't easy is employing people who will day in and day out keep a chipper attitude while around guests. I think that is a vital quality that will make any guest's stay better. This hotel is filled with employees just like this.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful weekend at a wonderful place!”
Reviews.Author: Mowings1
Reviews.Content: My wife and I absolutely loved our stay at the Buckingham! It was enjoyable on so many accounts. The rooms were so spacious and confortable! We didn't want to leave if not for the many attractions that were so conveniently located near by. The staff was so accommodating as well. Overall, we plan on making this establishment our annual residence for our beach getaways!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent facilities and excellent service”
Reviews.Author: amorreal
Reviews.Content: The hotel is a great atmosphere, very cozy and welcoming. Great location close to the boardwalk and attractions and beach. Highly recommend and will be staying here every time I come to Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “I loved it and I'll be back”
Reviews.Author: pamela723
Reviews.Content: Some of the rooms have ben renovated, very close to fun attractions. One block off of boardwalk on 15th st., very nice and helpful management and maintenance staff, Peter especially was helpful with check-in. The Buckingham Hotel is a great place to bring the whole family when vacationing in Ocean City!!!

Reviews.Title: “What a great place”
Reviews.Author: toppickers
Reviews.Content: We Just got home a few days ago and I wanted to write a review on this hotel.. AMAZING FOR THE PRICE, LOCATION, AND CLEAN!!!!!!! WE WERE PRETTY WORIED about staying there after all the reviews we had read.. This was a great lesson for sometimes the reviews are just people who were angry because they got kicked out or there was a problem with there attitude. We stayed a few days and have never been happier... THERE WERE NO BUGS AND NO SMELLS!!!! IT WAS PERFECT!! The staff was nice and eager to help if you need anything.. We live at the ocean and boardwalk when we are at Ocean city we stay at a hotel for sleeping and showering. I WAS SO IMPRESSED MY FRIEND IS COMING DOWN WITH KIDS AND THEY ARE STAYING THERE FOR A WEEK!! I MUST SAY THEY HAVE BEEN DOIN SOME CONSTRUCTION AND IT WAS NICE TO SEE THEM UPDATING BUT YET STILL A LOW PRICE.. THANKS FOR A GREAT STAY AND WE WILL BE RECOMMENDING MORE PEOPLE TOO STAY WITH YOU..

Reviews.Title: “Good place to crash not stay in all day. But for just that its way over priced.”
Reviews.Author: marissa1111
Reviews.Content: The people at Buckingham and very nice and friendly but for what u get its overpriced expecially for the first floor. I am currently down here for senior week and it is a great "just incase I couldn't find a random party to stay at" place to crash. We are on the first floor and to my knowledge it is the only floor that isn't remodeled so it isn't even comparable to the upper floors so try your best to get an upper room. The location is great very close to the beach. If you are looking for a nice place to stay don't stay here because the rooms are small and not close to an appartment. But the manger is really chill not like most places were u need to be in at a certain timeto be in and ur friends cant come in and out when ever. Overall it is a good story to tell because its the real senior week expeirence not a beautiful house with ever you want in it. It has a bed and a shower and a toilet so its enough to get by even though its not that clean. Personally if you look, you could probably get a nicer place for a cheaper price but overall its an expeirence and you will make friends and have good time. But if you can't make lemonade out of lemons don't stay here. Its only our second night so ill update u at the end of the week.

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs in Room 134(Apartment)”
Reviews.Author: OceanCityTourist
Reviews.Content: We found bed bugs on 2nd day of our stay. I dont recommend this hotel to anyone.We didnt get another room in that hotel after that and had to leave the hotel at 1:00 am in the morning.......had to do laundry at 2:00 am to make sure the bed bugs didnt get onto our clothes....bad experience.........I hope the hotel cleans up the mess and not let tourists hoping for a good time suffer.....

Reviews.Title: “Just what we needed”
Reviews.Author: traveling_fool30
Reviews.Content: We decided to 'hit the beach' for a long weekend. Staying close to the beach and boardwalk for a reasonable price was our only requirement. The Buckingham provided the ideal location, friendly service and a comfortable room. We were able park the car once we arrived and not move it until we left, spending the days on the beach and evenings walking the boardwalk - as I said location is perfect and just what we needed as a get away.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly and clean; close to the beach and attractions”
Reviews.Author: eugene000
Reviews.Content: My family went down for a long weekend. Our hotel room was very clean and recently renovated. The staff was very nice. And the location was great - in walking distance to the beach, boardwalk and attractions. An easy stay for parents and children. Great value for a reasonable price. Makes going on vacation affordable and plesant.

Reviews.Title: “Charming”
Reviews.Author: cstayeas
Reviews.Content: Our family used to come here many years ago, and it was such a charming hotel; nice staff, small but very pleasant. We were repeat customers and very satisfied. Have not been back in many years, but just came up to OC recently with the kids and the hotel is under total renovation. The location is great--downtown OC, easy access to beach/boardwalk. We will definetely try it again this summer!

Reviews.Title: “Good location and great staff.”
Reviews.Author: pbuas
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the buckingham hotel over the fourth of july weekend with my family of 6. We got 2 different rooms side by side. The hotel was a little old, but it had a great location and was good for the family. The rates were the best i've found and the value of the hotel was great. I heard they have remodeled for the upcoming summer!

Reviews.Title: “If your Choose is a homeless shelter or here!! Choose the shelter!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Matinicus
Reviews.Content: Lets start from the beginning!!!!The lobby dirty!!!but you think maybe they were just busy!!!Now I can safetly say just lazy!!!The eff apt that they so graciously upgraded us to free of charge was the most horrible place I personally have ever saw!!!!I saw coachroaches running on the kitchen counters!!!floors were full of lint and dirt!!!,bathroom was so GROSS!! you would most definitely want to use the local gas station to clean yourself in!!!!The smell was horrible!!! I went to the front desk where the desk clerk acted shocked,she then said she was going to hire some mexicans to clean that americans were lazy!!!we went to 5 different rooms !!!All filthy!!!not fit for anyone to stay in!!She eventually gave us a refund!!she said she would probably loose her job for this!!! and that she didn't want us in her face complaining for next 4 hrs!!!Ha Ha I called back later to the hotel to place an offficial complaints and Denise the same desk clerk said she would be able to assist because she was the general manager!!!Maybe she should leave the hotel for theatre!!!She gave us a very good performance in trying to make us feel sorry for her so we would stay !!!! We stayed at the atlantic hotel on 1st for 70.00 extra $$ for a 2 bedroom apt with a swimming pool!!!It was very nice and most all a CLEAN place!!!!!STAY AWAY FROM THE BUCKINGHAM HOTEL!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “gross!!!!!!!!!! please sleep in your car it need to be shut down by health department”
Reviews.Author: bugsbunny34
Reviews.Content: dont do it, please stay in your car the hotel is not fit for a dog to stay in walls in bathroom had mold and mild dew hair was on the towels when entering the room

Reviews.Title: “DON NOT STAY AT THIS NASTY HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: i43dad
Reviews.Content: me my kids and my cousin stayed at the buckingham motel well this was the worst motel ever, i complained all day the bed smelled like throw up, the room smelled like bug spray, we found used condoms on the floor, the towels were so nasty ( i dont think they even washed them ) i complained to the manager becky which she is very very nasty and rude she said she would not and could not do anything about the room, so finally at 11:30 pm i saw a different person working and told him about what happen he put us in another room after i laid them out asked him would you let your kids sleep n here with roaches and this nasty smell he said no. the motel is between 14th and 15th street please take my advise and dont stay there is so nasty there, we had people in the room on top of ours that parted all night long drinking smoking pot loud all night long, the workers never did anything about that, please dont stay at this motel...............

Reviews.Title: “For a last resort it was okay”
Reviews.Author: BeachBlonde21921
Reviews.Content: We decided on a Friday night at 11:00 that we wanted to go down to Ocean City that night... We were calling all the Hotels we knew and no one had vacancy's unless it was a efficiancy. So we went online and found Buckingham and how resonable they were. We booked 2 nights right then and there. We knew we were going during Senior Week but we didn't mind. The clerk did tell us we were coming to a Hotel full of graduates and if we were ok with that. I said sure. Very friendly clerks and security. Very nasty smell through out first floor... smelled like bad body odor. Never got the whole idea of the 2 doors though?? Room was small, no water pressure and towels were stained and no fitted sheets only laid on flat sheets which moved during night and would end up on mattress. EWW. My husband was not happy at all but we did manage. My boys didn't mind it, my mother also went with us and her and I cracked jokes the whole time. You live you learn. Oh and to top everything off the parking is horrific. We had to park 2 blocks away which I was ok with considering the lot was super small. I wouldn't stay again but it sure was a learning experience!! Oh and the maids were super friendly too. Just bang on your door at 9am to get towels and give fresh ones.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay under any circumstances!!!”
Reviews.Author: freqflyer98
Reviews.Content: We decided at the last minute to go to the beach for one day/one night. Unfortunately I didn't research this hotel. It was the absolute worst I have ever seen in my life. The towels had stains on them, sheets/bedding smelled like bad feet/ body odor and most likely hadn't been washed in ages. The hotel is on the main road with no curtains and the street lights/noise comes right through the windows. We ended up checking out at 11 pm (with 2 small children!) once we pulled the covers back and smelled/saw what was one them. All 4 of us itched for 3 days after leaving, didn't physically see any bugs but guarantee there are some. I am currently fighting my charges.

Reviews.Title: “Dont wast your time or money”
Reviews.Author: treatedpoorly
Reviews.Content: NASTY<NASTY<NASTY!!!! They Don’t like Americans. The parking lot is an insurance claim waiting to happen. You name it, It was dirty (rooms, towels, linens).Checked three other rooms because ours was horrible, and the other rooms were just as bad. BUGS in the beds and running across the floor. They WILL NOT REFUND YOUR MONEY!!!! A/C window units WORTHLESS!!!! You were warned!

Reviews.Title: “ABANDON ALL HOPE YE WHO ENTER THESE DOORS”
Reviews.Author: def321
Reviews.Content: It started with a very dirty carpeted floor in the hallway to the reception desk. The room had a smell like a hundred overweight men just out of a sauna dried themselves on everything in the room. I didn't find any bugs in the room, but there were three condoms under the mattress (this is after we were told it was cleaned). The carpet had all sorts of lint and paper over it. The night stand had boogers on it. The bathroom light switch was grimy, and so was the base board along the outside wall. We didn't have our credit cards with us (in case of robbery), so we were kind of stuck with the place. We went and bought Clorox wipes and Frabreeze to try and clean up a bit. We didn't get any sleep because there was a beer bash going on until 4:30 AM and the trash can was right outside our window. The next morning we complained and got a different room. That one had ants through the sheets (again, this room was supposed to be just cleaned up). We left without staying any more nights, we cut our losses and left Ocean City. I guess that is why they have a no refund policy. Honestly, living in the desert for the military was a lot more habitable than this hole.

Reviews.Title: “You Get What You Pay For”
Reviews.Author: FanciePantz89
Reviews.Content: It wasn't the best place, and honestly my friends and I were a little surprised when we walked in and saw how small the room was, but we just joked about it and stayed on the beach. The rates were great, and it's a really good location for being only half a block away from the beach. I've heard from others that the efficiency rooms aren't all that great, so unless you absolutely want the kitchen/etc then just go for a deluxe room or something. My friends and I went and we had no problems at all - our stuff was all there when we got back to the room and the door locked. Really, it's a half a block away from the beach and boardwalk, and even if the room isn't the greatest place to live for a couple of days it's a really awesome price for the location, I think.

Reviews.Title: “you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: star0054
Reviews.Content: you get what you pay for ,we locked our door when we went out and it was unlocked when we returned ,I do have to say it was clean and it didnt smell ,decor not nice,we were in a pinch we just took anything

Reviews.Title: “Big Sloppy Deuce”
Reviews.Author: buttonsbowsPhilly
Reviews.Content: Did anyone watch the movie "Big" with Tom Hanks from the 80's. Well, if you did this hotel reminds me of the ST. James Motel he stays in when he first moves to the city. The bathroom was so small my boyfriend had to take the toilet paper off the roll to sit down on the toilet. He is only 6'2" and 220lbs. None of the furniture matched. I was so disgusted I ended up leaving a day early. I would have rather slept in my car or on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “an experience !”
Reviews.Author: shamrock192a
Reviews.Content: They had a 3 day deal that seemed great. Even though the furniture was very dated, the room was O K. Not great, but O.K. Accessibility to a computer and free coffee in the lobby was a nice bonus. On the negative side, the walls were kind of thin, and the parking lot much too congested. As has been said many times in the past and will be repeated again and again, " YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR". We were looking for something "CHEAP" and that is exactly what we got!! I doubt that we will be staying there again

Reviews.Title: “dont stay here”
Reviews.Author: bh101
Reviews.Content: me and some friends stayed at the buckingham for senior week and I have to say for the price you pay you can find somewhere much nicer for seniors trying to have a good time DONT STAY HERE. the security guards there are horrible they will randomly search rooms because they can and they will take what they want to. I promise you this is the truth dont stay at the buckingham its a cheap nasty dirty place. I wouldn't stay there for free.

Reviews.Title: “cockroach infested do not give them any of your money!!!!”
Reviews.Author: spotPennsylvania
Reviews.Content: DO NOT stay at this cockroach infested disgusting place!!!!!!!!! My sister inlaw and I took our kids to the beach and got an apartment there, it was horrible!!! To start it off..... we couldn't get into our room because they were supposedly cleaning it..... NOT!!!! It was filthy.... pubic hair on the towels that were supposedly clean!!!! The a/c did not work, it was cooler outside!!! The pull out couch had stains on that we did not want our kids to sit on, it was covered in dog hair!!!! We pulled it out for the bed.... my leg went clear to the floor!!!! No support under it to even sleep on!!! What a joke!!!! But wait.... it gets better.... our 2nd night there we get home the guys that stayed underneath us told us they had cockroaches....we go upstairs.... an hour or so later end up killing 2 baby cockroaches!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! We went and complained and they acted like the would do nothing and i told them we did NOT come there with cockroaches and we better not be leaving with any either or they will be paying my extermination bill!!!! Finally they call the manager and get us another place to stay in.... the guys that stayed underneath us brought over HUGE cockroaches in a cup and said they were crawling out of their sinks!!!!! It was gross!!!!! So they had us move to this house on 10th street....packing up and dragging kids at midnight because of cockroaches!!!! So we go to new place and kill piss ants..... next day.... all of our groceries were infested with piss ants and we had to throw it all away!!!!!!!!! I was NOT happy....but of course in one ear and out the other ....a big run around about how they can't contact the owner..... all bunch of crap!!!!! The last day we stayed i get up and kill a big cockroach in that place!!!!! They acted stupid and of course we never got anywhere BUT...... we did take pictures of the filth and the cockroaches and did contact the board of health in maryland and they are investigating!!!!!!!!!!!!! That place should be bull dozed over and NEVER reopened again!!!!!!!!!!! I now know why they have a sign up saying NO refunds!!!! They know as soon as you open the door your gonna be running over for your $$$ back because of the cockroaches!!!! Beware do not give these losers any of your $$$$ they need to hang a sign out saying ...." Roach coach piss ant infested buckingham hotel!!!!!" Atleast then you would have fair warning!!!! haha!!!!! If I had a data cable for my phone I would gladly post the pictures of the nasty filth and cockroaches.... I may have to invest just to save other people the grief we went through!!! Maybe after the board of health investigates it will be shut down for good!!!!

Reviews.Title: “great price, and location,”
Reviews.Author: fishoc
Reviews.Content: nice small hotel . no major chain, but not the major chain price. would go back. Shawn at the desk was a great help.

Reviews.Title: “we got robbed!!! dont ever stay here!!!”
Reviews.Author: badgurlie2134
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for senior week! We got robbed! All our money was stolen and the staff did NOTHING about it! We even called the owner and he had nothing to say! Horrible experience.

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay Here!”
Reviews.Author: femmenikkita220
Reviews.Content: This was the worst hotel I've ever stayed in. I must have been there at the same time as last reviewer because I heard the lady at the front desk screaming at a group of people trying to come in. She was absolutely rude to these people who, as far as I could tell, did nothing wrong. Our room was disgusting. The sheets did not look clean at all and the bed was extremely uncomfortable. The bathroom was disgusting. I felt dirtier after my showers than before! There were bugs in our room and I left with many itchy red bites on my back, arms and legs. I would not suggest this hotel to anyone. It is definitely not worth the price. I would spend the extra money to stay somewhere with a friendly staff and clean rooms!

Reviews.Title: “Robbed at the Buckingham..”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: do not stay here!! People will rob you even if your door is locked!! Room was broken into while at the beach, and money was all gone. No hott water at all and no room service, All the maids do is throw clean towels on your floor infront of your door. Do they make your beds? nope. Don't ever stay here.

HotelInfo.Name: Buckingham Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 1405 Baltimore Ave., Ocean City, MD 21842 (Formerly Buckingham Motel)
